item.title: Lower tree branches obstruct view when turning out of Cator Rd on to Lennard Rd, 17th October
item.description:
First large tree has lots of branches and growth at the bottom which obstructs the view when trying to turn out of Cator Rd onto Lennard Rd, making it dangerous. It is an areas with a high number of school children.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 66, Lennard Road, Penge, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large amounts of litter near parking spaces in Ruskin Avenue, 17th October
item.description:
Litter on Ruskin Avenue near the corner of Deepdene. Lots of takeaway boxes, someone's hub cap, nappies, baby wipes. This litter has been laying here for at least a week and needs picking up before it invites pests. We need regular street cleaning for the roads that join onto the high street as people are parking, eating then dumping their rubbish. It is especially noticeable on Monday mornings. Shouldn't business rates cover some of this? It's mainly their customers abusing the street.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Ruskin Avenue, Welling, London
Report on FixMyStreet
